market_position.description: Salesforce remains the #1 CRM provider by market share for the sixth year in a row
initiatives: Maintaining leadership in CRM across sales, service, marketing, commerce, communities, integration, and app development
Expanding Customer 360 platform through organic growth and acquisitions
goals: Drive growth through innovation and platform expansion

innovation.description: Focus on Customer 360 and AI innovations
initiatives: Customer 360 providing unified customer views across sales, service, marketing, commerce, and communities
Customer 360 Truth connecting all data across Salesforce platforms
Einstein Voice Skills enabling voice-powered Salesforce apps
Trailhead reskilling platform expanding to 1.8 million learners
Partnership with Southern New Hampshire University for Trailhead college credit
goals: Empower customers with AI and blockchain capabilities
Drive workforce development and ecosystem growth
examples: Customer 360 Truth enabling integrated, single source of truth for customers
Einstein Voice Skills allowing voice queries like 'Hey Einstein, what's my forecast?'
Trailhead empowering 1.8 million learners and contributing to 4.2 million jobs and $1.2 trillion in new business revenues

tableau.description: Integration of Tableau into Salesforce ecosystem
initiatives: Enhancing data visualization and analytics capabilities
goals: Leverage Tableau for advanced business intelligence
examples: Tableau contributing approximately $327 million to Q3 revenue
Integration benefiting customers like Nissan, Morgan Stanley, Home Depot

goals: Empower nonprofit, education, and philanthropy customers
examples: Salesforce.org contributing approximately $80 million to Q3 revenue

clicksoftware.description: Acquisition of ClickSoftware to enhance field service capabilities
examples: FOX Sports choosing Field Service Lightning

My Trailhead for customers to create branded learning experiences
